title: The 2015 Geekie Awards Winners Are Named, Complete List of Top Creators in Digital Entertainment, Gaming, Comics, Art & Fashion
text:
The 2015 Geekie Awards Winners Are Named, Complete List of Top Creators in Digital Entertainment, Gaming, Comics, Art & Fashion
The 3rd Annual Geekie Awards took place at Club Nokia in Los Angeles, CA on October 15, 2015, with special guests Kevin Smith, Ernie Hudson, Jason Mewes, Michael C Gross and more.
Los Angeles, CA, October 20, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Geekie Awards®, an award show by geeks for geeks™ presented The 3rd Annual Geekie Awards at Club Nokia in Los Angeles, CA on October 15, 2015. The ceremony honored talented creators, giving them the opportunity to receive recognition in front of a worldwide audience and leaders in entertainment, gaming, comics, art, and fashion. Leaders such as Kevin Smith, who took home the first ‘Geek Pioneer’Award, and Michael C Gross, the recipient of the 2015 Stan Lee Lifetime Achievement Award.
The 2015 Geekie Awards were live-streamed via Ustream, powered by Encore Media, on Thursday October 15, 2015 at 7:00PM PST: http://www.ustream.tv/recorded/75591224.
A complete list of all 2015 Geekie Awards recipients and winners presented along with links is below:
Stan Lee Lifetime Achievement (presented by POW! Entertainment, Inc)
Michael C Gross / presenter Ernie Hudson http://www.ustream.tv/recorded/75591224/highlight/661013

The Geekie Awards, would like to acknowledge the 2015 Sponsors:
The Geekie Awards would like to acknowledge our 2015 Sponsors: OZ, Mopar, Discovery Digital Networks, PepsiCo Interactive, Gunner, POW! Entertainment, WowWee, For Human Peoples, WebMovement, Wahoos, Shakey's, Hero Crate, J!NX, Encore Streaming, LiveU, GMG, Arcustech, 3d Light FX, melin, Plantronics, Inc. Special thanks to our community partners: Her Universe, We Love Fine, Geek Nation, International Academy of Web Television, LA Cosplay Con, San Diego Comic Fest, Fashionably Nerdy, and Indie Game U for helping take indie creators to the next level!
About The Geekie Awards:
The Geekie Awards®, an award show by geeks for geeks™, is aimed at placing the geek culture in the spotlight as a collection of valid, respected, award-winning genres for storytelling and creation. In an industry filled with award shows for established celebrities, we honor talented, independent creators and give them the opportunity to receive recognition in front of a worldwide audience and leaders in their respective industries. The Geekie Awards inspires creativity and hope and fosters cross-market innovation among entertainment, gaming, comics, art, and fashion. Their mission is to create a fun, action-packed, unforgettable broadcast event tailored to all of the things we geeks love -- delivered via the latest digital technologies.
Additional information about The Geekie Awards, is available at:www.TheGeekieAwards.com | Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheGeekieAwards | Follow #GeekieAwards at http://twitter.com/TheGeekieAwards on twitter.
